results.lead_paragraph: Russian Arts Festival ''Solyarus,'' a Russian film to be screened tomorrow at 7 p.m., is one of six Russian films to be shown at various times through March 21 in the Russian Arts and Letters Festival at Fairfield University. The festival opens this week at the Regina A. Quick Center for the Arts. Adapted from a novel by Stanislaw Lem and directed by Andrei Tarkovsky, the film follows a cosmonaut on a journey to a planet where nothing is what it seems and memories can become reality.
